TAMIL NADU GOVERNMENT GAZETTE EXTRAORDINARY
STATEMENT OF OBJECTS AND REASONS.
It has been brought to the knowledge of the Government that the registered dealers dealing with white goods such as T.V., Washing machines etc., are selling the goods at a price less than the purchase price of those goods by availing discount from the seller. In view of this, the output tax payable on those goods becomes less than the input tax credit available to them. The excess input tax credit available is being adjusted against any outstanding tax due from those dealers or carried forward to the next year or refunded. In order to protect the revenue of the Government, the Government have decided to amend the Tamil Nadu Value Added Tax Act, 2006 (Tamil Nadu Act 32 of 2006).
2. The Bill seeks to give effect to the above decision.
S.N.M. UBAYADULLAH, Minister for Commercial Taxes.
M. SELVARAJ, Secretary.
